name: Gorefield: The Game
description:
Explore an open world crawling with dangerous creatures that resemble a familiar fat cat. Collect a variety of items and kill a multitude of bosses to escape from the hellish plane you now roam.

Update 1.1.0:

Includes updated shop items and prices, new difficulty options as well as bug fixes and increased stability for less powerful devices.

Update 1.1.1:

Changed Normal mode to Nermal mode. Updated the credits.

Update 1.1.2:

Minor bug fix.

All credits listed within the credits section of the main menu. This game is based off the work of countless people however all companies/artists are not affiliated with the project.
